TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManifestSignatureInformationCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation>
Public NotInheritable Class ManifestSignatureInformationCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollection(Of ManifestSignatureInformation)

Docs.summary: Rappresenta una raccolta in sola lettura di oggetti .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Per ottenere un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformationCollection> raccolta, chiamare uno del <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> overload del metodo.
Ogni raccolta contiene un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation> oggetto per ogni manifesto che Ã¨ stata verificata mediante la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> metodo.
